title: KISS Saves Santa
description: Mrs. Claus calls on KISS to save Christmas and find out what happened to Santa.
quote: Someone stole Santa? That does not rock!
altHero: the rock band KISS at the North Pole with Mrs. Claus
alt1: KISS gives the metal sign from a helicopter
alt2: Santa in a giant nest with pterodactyls hatching from giant eggs
alt3: KISS sending rock vibes with their guitars
alt4: KISS reuniting Santa with Mrs. Claus
